channel.title: Cuple questions need help with
channel.description:
ok i added global objects well changed the location and they dont appear in the old or new location why is this..
second question how would i change it to say [playername] has logged out instead of [playername] has logged in every time.
third question can you help me with the first 2 =p
i added the global objects to two different servers one with and without silabs. does same for both..
if you could help id appreciate it and you might get a present =p

item.title: Cuple questions need help with
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

the object ids i have should work… seeing as they worked before i changed the cords on them.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 06:51:15 AM[/size][hr]hm i put them back in original spot now i see them im gonna try just copying them and adding new 1s at the location i want

i added it like this… the top 1s show but the bottom 1s at the new cords dont…

AddGlobalObject(3251, 3439, 409, -2, 10);//altar
AddGlobalObject(2729, 3493, 381, -2, 10);//bookcase
AddGlobalObject(2729, 3492, 381, -2, 10);//bookcase
AddGlobalObject(2727, 3484, 299, -2, 10);//hay
AddGlobalObject(2724, 3484, 299, -2, 10);//hay
AddGlobalObject(2729, 3495, 2513, -1, 10);//range target
AddGlobalObject(2729, 3496, 2513, -1, 10);//range target
AddGlobalObject(2724, 3490, 823, -3, 10);//dummy
AddGlobalObject(2720, 3495, 411, -3, 10);//altar
AddGlobalObject(2723, 3490, 823, -3, 10);//dummy
AddGlobalObject(2722, 3490, 823, -3, 10);//dummy
AddGlobalObject(2721, 3493, 414, -1, 10);//coffin
AddGlobalObject(2721, 3492, 414, -1, 10);//coffin
AddGlobalObject(2721, 3491, 414, -1, 10);//coffin
AddGlobalObject(2722, 3488, 1306, 0, 10);//magic tree


AddGlobalObject(2729, 3091, 3486, -2, 10);//bookcase
AddGlobalObject(2729, 3091, 3484, -2, 10);//bookcase
AddGlobalObject(2727, 3083, 3489, -2, 10);//hay
AddGlobalObject(2724, 3083, 3487, -2, 10);//hay
AddGlobalObject(2729, 3090, 3489, -1, 10);//range target
AddGlobalObject(2729, 3090, 3488, -1, 10);//range target
AddGlobalObject(2720, 3083, 3485, -3, 10);//altar
AddGlobalObject(2724, 3090, 3483, -3, 10);//dummy
AddGlobalObject(2723, 3089, 3483, -3, 10);//dummy
AddGlobalObject(2722, 3088, 3483, -3, 10);//dummy
AddGlobalObject(2721, 3086, 3483, -1, 10);//coffin
AddGlobalObject(2721, 3085, 3483, -1, 10);//coffin
AddGlobalObject(2721, 3084, 3483, -1, 10);//coffin
AddGlobalObject(2722, 3090, 3492, 0, 10);//magic tree

some 1 please help i would like to get my server back up soon been down bout 2 weeks…

item.title: Cuple questions need help with
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

still nothing … what do you mean wrong method.

this is what i have above them…

/* OBJECTS MAIN */
	public int GetObject(int X, int Y, int ObjectID) {
		for(int i = 0; i < server.objectHandler.MaxObjects; i++) {
			if (server.objectHandler.ObjectID[i] > -1) {
				if (X == server.objectHandler.ObjectX[i] && Y == server.objectHandler.ObjectY[i]) {
					if (ObjectID != -1) {
						if (ObjectID == server.objectHandler.ObjectID[i]) {
							return i;
						}
					} else {
						return i;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		return -1;
	}
        public void ChangeDoor(int ArrayID) {
		int objectID = server.objectHandler.ObjectOriID[ArrayID];
		int objectX = server.objectHandler.ObjectX[ArrayID];
		int objectY = server.objectHandler.ObjectY[ArrayID];
		int Face = server.objectHandler.ObjectFace[ArrayID];
		int Type = server.objectHandler.ObjectType[ArrayID];
		ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, -1, -1, 0);
		switch (Type) {
			case 1:
				ReplaceObject2(objectX, (objectY + 1), objectID, Face, 0);
				server.objectHandler.ObjectType[ArrayID] = 2;
				break;
			case 2:
				ReplaceObject2(objectX, (objectY - 1), objectID, Face, 0);
				server.objectHandler.ObjectType[ArrayID] = 1;
				break;
			case 3:
				ReplaceObject2((objectX + 1), objectY, objectID, Face, 0);
				server.objectHandler.ObjectType[ArrayID] = 4;
				break;
			case 4:
				ReplaceObject2((objectX - 1), objectY, objectID, Face, 0);
				server.objectHandler.ObjectType[ArrayID] = 3;
				break;
		}
	}
public void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)
{
 outStream.createFrame(85);
               outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
               outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

 outStream.createFrame(151);
 //outStream.writeByteA(((x&7) << 4) + (y&7));
               outStream.writeByteA(0);
 outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
 outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3));
}

	public void ReplaceObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) {
		outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60);
		outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
		outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));
		/*DELETE OBJECT*/
 		outStream.writeByte(101);
		outStream.writeByteC(0);
		outStream.writeByte(0);
		/*CREATE OBJECT*/
		if (NewObjectID > -1) {
			outStream.writeByte(151);
			outStream.writeByteS(0);
			outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID);
			outStream.writeByteA(Face); //0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
		}
		outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
                }
	public void ReplaceObject2(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face, int ObjectType) {
		outStream.createFrame(85);
		outStream.writeByteC(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
		outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));

		outStream.createFrame(101);
		outStream.writeByteC((ObjectType<<2) + (Face&3));
		outStream.writeByte(0);

		if (NewObjectID != -1) {
			outStream.createFrame(151);
			outStream.writeByteS(0);
			outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID);
			outStream.writeByteS((ObjectType<<2) + (Face&3));
			//FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
			//ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration
		}
	}
	public void NewObjects()
	{

Read full topic
